ad.name: Bacon Vodka
ad.text: Bakon, a bacon-infused vodka, is a sure sign of the end times for the bacon craze. The taste of bacon is meant to fill your stomach and please your palate, not empty the former and obliterate the latter.

ad.name: Bacon Air Freshener
ad.text: Bacon smells great, but only when you're about to eat it, eating it or just finished eating it. The smell of bacon, on the other hand, freshens nothing sans cooking, eating or some combination of the two.

ad.name: Bacon Toothpaste
ad.text: Like the lip balm, we're pretty sure you'll eat the entire tube before any of it touches your teeth with the intent to clean. Yes, it's real toothpaste and will actually clean your mouth and fight cavities, but gross.
